mapper.sql: wivd.inventory_verification_det_id, wivd.inventory_verification_id, wivd.source_det_id, wivd.storage_id, wivd.material_id, wivd.original_qty, wivd.inventory_qty, wivd.discrepancy_qty, wivd.up_discrepancy_qty, wivd.batch_code, wivd.work_name, wivd.register, wivd.remark, wivd.organization_id, wivd.create_user_id, wivd.create_time, wivd.modified_user_id, wivd.modified_time
mapper.select:
SELECT ,storage_name,sm.material_code,sm.material_name,bt.color,bt.material_quality,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name FROM wms_inventory_verification_det wivd LEFT JOIN smt_storage ss ON wivd.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm ON wivd.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab bt ON sm.material_id = bt.material_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON wivd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON wivd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON wivd.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and wivd.inventory_verification_id = #{inventoryVerificationId}
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%',#{storageName},'%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
